function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertain future due to pandemic duration and vaccine availability","Impact":"Disruption in workplace planning and management","Mitigation":"Regular updates on pandemic status, flexible workplace planning","Technologies":"Remote work technology, portfolio management software","People":"Employees, workplace managers","Owner":"Top management"},{"Description":"Portfolio transformation and technology adoption","Impact":"Disruption due to rapid changes in workplace infrastructure","Mitigation":"Gradual transition, training and support for employees","Technologies":"Portfolio management software, workplace technology tools","People":"Employees, workplace management","Owner":"Top management"}]}
